name: Clowns (2020)
description:
Your circus is destroyed, and the mad clowns have decided to finally destroy your business and intend to destroy the circus that You intend to protect to the last. Collect bonuses and many different weapons for your defense, Dodge evil clowns and their explosive surprises!

Clowns-2d shooter with platformer elements, where the player protects the circus tent from the incoming wave of clown destroyers, picking up unique weapons and bonuses that will help in passing the levels and the final meeting with a huge clown.


Feature of game:
- Complexity
- Pixel-Art
- Unique weapon
- Boss
